revision.comment: Note that the flags are set by direct assignment so a large number of flags may be cleared.
revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_ThrustInitUp'''
(''no parameter'')
Sets special2 (raise speed) to 5, initializes floor clipping to 0, sets the first argument to 1 (raised), and sets special1 to 0. The flags {{Flag|SOLID}}, {{Flag|NOTELEPORT}}, and {{Flag|FLOORCLIP}} are set and many other are cleared. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|ThrustFloor}} and derived classes.
